Field Label: Date and time of informed consent
Field Note: Record the date/time according to the ISO 8601, the International Standard for the representation of dates and times (http://www.iso.org/iso/home.html). The date/time should be recorded to the level of granularity known (e.g., year, year and month, complete date plus hours and minutes, etc.).

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Written informed consent by the participant/subject | 2, Written informed consent by the legal representative on behalf of the participant/subject who gave assent | 3, Written informed consent by the legal representative on behalf of the participant/subject who was unable to give assent | 4, Waiver of consent
